properties.title: AVD Landing Zone Accelerator - Custom Image Build

options.text: The subscription and location selected in this step, will be used to deploy AVD Shared Services Landing Zone resources (compute gallery, key vaults, storage, image template, etc.).
Azure AVD Landing Zones ARM deployment requires owner access at the subscription scope. Visit this link to get more information on RBAC permissions and scopes.
This solution will deploy a compute gallery, image definition, image version, managed identity and execute an Azure Image Builder build.

elements.name: redundancy
elements.label: Redundancy
elements.toolTip: Determine the redundancy for the Storage Account.

elements.name: versionSelection
elements.label: Version
elements.toolTip: Select the operating system version for the source image.

options.text: Azure Image Builder is not available in all locations. Click here for more information.

elements.name: locationSelection
elements.label: Deployment Location
elements.toolTip: Select the location where Azure Image Builder will run to create the image.

elements.name: virtualNetwork
elements.label: Existing Virtual Network
elements.toolTip: Select an existing virtual network and subnet for the AIB build virtual machines. This enables the use of Private Link and prevents the deployment of public IP addresses.

elements.name: subnet
elements.label: Select Subnet
elements.toolTip: Select an existing subnet for AIB build virtual machines. This enables the use of Private Link and prevents the deployment of public IP addresses.

options.text: RDP Short Path for Managed Networks is a beneficial feature under specific conditions. Click here for more information.

elements.name: rdpShortPathSelection
elements.label: Enable RDP Short Path for Managed Networks
elements.toolTip: Determine whether to enable RDP short path for managed networks on the AVD session hosts.

options.text: Screen Capture Protection is a beneficial feature under specific conditions. Click here for more information.

elements.name: screenCaptureProtectionSelection
elements.label: Enable Screen Capture Protection
elements.toolTip: Determine whether to enable Screen Capture Protection for the AVD session hosts.

elements.name: monitoringAndAlerting
elements.label: Enable Monitoring & Alerting
elements.toolTip: Determine whether to enable monitoring and alerting for the Azure Image Builder builds.

elements.name: distributionGroup
elements.label: Distribution Group
elements.toolTip: Input the distribution group for receiving alerts on the build status.

constraints.validationMessage: The value must be a valid email address.

options.text: The AVD accelerator provides automated resource naming based on Microsoft best practices, default resource organization and naming is shown in the diagram.

elements.name: customNamingSelection
elements.label: Custom Resource Naming
elements.toolTip: When set to 'Yes', the information will be used to name resources. When set to 'No', the deployment will use the AVD accelerator naming standard.

options.text: When using custom names, please follow the guidance on the Naming Rules and Restrictions for Azure Resources webpage.

elements.name: resourceGroup
elements.label: Resource group
elements.toolTip: Input a custom name for the shared services resource group.

constraints.validationMessage: The value must be alphanumerics, underscores, hyphens, periods, and parentheses. The value must not end with a period. The length must be 1 to 90 characters.

elements.name: computeGallery
elements.label: Compute Gallery
elements.toolTip: Input a custom name for the Azure Compute Gallery.

constraints.validationMessage: The value must be alphanumerics, underscores, and periods. The value must begin and end with alphanumerics. The length must be 1 to 80 characters.

elements.name: imageDefinition
elements.label: Image Definition
elements.toolTip: Input a custom name for the Image Definition in the Compute Gallery.

constraints.validationMessage: The value must be alphanumerics, underscores, hyphens, and periods. The value must start and end with an alphanumeric. The length must be 1 to 80 characters.

elements.name: imageTemplate
elements.label: Image Template
elements.toolTip: Input a custom name for the AIB Image Template.

elements.name: automationAccount
elements.label: Automation Account
elements.toolTip: Input a custom name for the Automation Account.

constraints.validationMessage: The value must be alphanumerics and hyphens. The value must start with a letter and end with an alphanumeric. The length must be 6 to 50 characters.

elements.name: logAnalyticsWorkspace
elements.label: Log Analytics Workspace
elements.toolTip: Input a custom name for the Log Analytics Workspace.

constraints.validationMessage: The value must be alphanumerics and hyphens. The value must start and end with an alphanumeric. The length must be 4 to 63 characters.

elements.name: storageAccount
elements.label: Storage Account
elements.toolTip: Input a custom name for the Storage Account.

validations.message: The value must be lowercase letters and numbers. The length must be 3 to 24 characters.

elements.name: aibContainer
elements.label: AIB Artifacts Container
elements.toolTip: Input a custom name for the AIB container in the Storage Account.

constraints.validationMessage: The value must be lowercase letters, numbers, and hyphens. The value must start with a lowercase letter or number. The value must not contain consecutive hyphens. The length must be 3 to 63 characters.

elements.name: avdContainer
elements.label: AVD Artifacts Container
elements.toolTip: Input a custom name for the AVD container in the Storage Account.

constraints.validationMessage: The value must be lowercase letters, numbers, and hyphens. The value must start with a lowercase letter or number. The value must not contain consecutive hyphens. The length must be 3 to 63 characters.

elements.name: keyVault
elements.label: Key Vault Prefix
elements.toolTip: Input a custom name for the Key Vault.

constraints.validationMessage: The value must be alphanumerics and hyphens. The value must start with a letter and end with a letter or number. The length must be 3 to 24 characters.

elements.name: actionGroup
elements.label: Action Group
elements.toolTip: Input a custom name for the Action Group.

constraints.validationMessage: The value must not contain: :<>+/&%\?. The value must not end with a space or period. The length must be 1 to 260 characters.

options.text: AVD accelerator has built-in resource naming automation based and best practices Microsoft Cloud Adoption Framework (CAF) naming convention.
And abbreviations recommendations for Azure resource types.

elements.name: selection
elements.label: Custom Resource Tags
elements.toolTip: When set 'Yes', the information provided will be used to create tags on resources and resource groups.

elements.name: imageBuild
elements.label: Image Build
elements.toolTip: Input the value for the tag key 'ImageBuildName'.

elements.name: workload
elements.label: Workload
elements.toolTip: Input the value for the tag key 'WorkloadName'.

elements.name: dataClassification
elements.label: Data Classification
elements.toolTip: Select the value for the tag key 'DataClassification', in reference to the sensitivity of the data hosted.

elements.name: department
elements.label: Department
elements.toolTip: Input the value for the tag key 'Department', in reference to the department that owns the deployment.

elements.name: criticality
elements.label: Criticality
elements.toolTip: Select the value for the tag key named 'Criticality', in reference to the criticality of the workload.

elements.name: customCriticality
elements.label: Custom Criticality
elements.toolTip: Input the value for the tag key 'Criticality', in reference to a custom criticality for the workload.

elements.name: application
elements.label: Application Name
elements.toolTip: Input the value for the tag key 'ApplicationName', in reference to the details about the application.

elements.name: operationsTeam
elements.label: Operations Team
elements.toolTip: Input the value for the tag key 'OpsTeam', in reference to the team accountable for day-to-day operations.

elements.name: owner
elements.label: Owner
elements.toolTip: Input the value for the tag key 'Owner', in reference to the organizational owner of the AVD deployment.

elements.name: costCenter
elements.label: Cost Center
elements.toolTip: Input the value for the tag key 'CostCenter', in reference to the cost center of the owning team.

elements.name: environment
elements.label: Environment
elements.toolTip: Select the value for the tag key 'Environment', in reference to the environment type of the workload.
